edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.layers

Class LayerDrawingOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.layers.LayerDrawingOptions

  • public class LayerDrawingOptions
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
    The LayerDrawingOptions class prvoides options for setting ArcGISDynamicMapServiceLayer rendering options. Requires ArcGIS Server 10.1 or greater.
    Author:
    Justin Merz

      • scaleSymbols

        public final boolean scaleSymbols()
        Determines if the layer renders the symbols based on scale. When false the layer does not render the symbols based on scale.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • setScaleSymbols

        public final void setScaleSymbols(boolean scaleSymbols)
        Set scaleSymbols parameter.
        Parameters:
        scaleSymbols - - Determines if the layer renders the symbols based on scale. When false the layer does not render the symbols based on scale.

      • showLabels

        public final boolean showLabels()
        Determines if labels are displayed. When false, labels for the layer are not displayed.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • showLabels

        public final void showLabels(boolean showLabels)
        Set the showLabels parameter.
        Parameters:
        showLabels - - Determines if labels are displayed. When false, labels for the layer are not displayed.

      • getTransparency

        public final double getTransparency()
        The transparency of the layer. Values range from 0 to 1.0 where 0 is 100% transparent and 1 has no transparency.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • setTransparency

        public final void setTransparency(double transparency)
        Set the transparency of the layer.
        Parameters:
        transparency - - The transparency of the layer. Values range from 0 to 1.0 where 0 is 100% transparent and 1 has no transparency.
